title: UFC 243 live streaming commentary with MMA Junkie Radio on SportsCastr
text:
UFC 243 takes place Saturday with a title-unification bout at the top of the bill, and MMA Junkie Radio hosts “Gorgeous” George and “Goze” will have live streaming commentary via SportsCastr that kicks off for the main card at 10 p.m. ET.

In the main event, middleweight champion Robert Whittaker meets interim titleholder Israel Adesanya in a bout that’s being billed as the biggest fight ever in the Oceanic region. And in the co-headliner, Al Iaquinta takes on Dan Hooker in a key lightweight bout.

UFC 243 takes place at Marvel Stadium, where more than 50,000 fans are expected to be in attendance. Here’s the five-fight main card:

Champ Robert Whittaker vs. interim champ Israel Adesanya – to unify middleweight title

Dan Hooker vs. Al Iaquinta

Sergey Spivak vs. Tai Tuivasa

Luke Jumeau vs. Dhiego Lima

Yorgan De Castro vs. Justin Tafa

Be sure to check back and follow @MMAjunkie, @MMAjunkieRadio and @SportsCastrLive on Twitter to be notified when the guys go live.
description: Join MMA Junkie Radio's "Gorgeous" George and "Goze" for live SportsCastr commentary of the UFC 242 main card.
